semantic_identifier: [GOLD-103]: Enforce published-only positioning usage in Sales_Accelerator with clear UX when a version is unavailable
title: Enforce published-only positioning usage in Sales_Accelerator with clear UX when a version is unavailable

sections.text: Add server-side validation to ensure Sales_Accelerator can only generate/send messaging from Customer_Analyzer positioning block versions marked as published/approved, never drafts or unversioned payloads. When a pinned version is missing or unpublished, return a structured error that the UI can render as a blocking state with an explicit reason and the last known pinned version as the only fallback. Update the messaging/recommendation UI to display the pinned positioning version and show a clear prompt to request Marketing publish a new variant rather than silently switching content.
